name: Smart Strip®
description: Smart Strip® Advanced Paint Remover strips multiple layers of oil, latex, and acrylic-based paints, varnishes, stains, and coatings, usually in a single application. It is versatile enough to work on virtually all interior and exterior surfaces such as wood, brick, stone, metal, marble, terra cotta, granite, terrazzo, concrete, plaster, cement, copper, tin, enamel, slate, cast iron, and more. It functions best on post 1980’s paints and coatings. Smart Strip Advanced Paint Remover is easy to use. Simply apply Smart Strip to the desired area for removal and let Smart Strip do its work for up to 24 hours. Remove with a scrapper or pressure washer and clean area thoroughly with water. Smart Strip Advanced Paint Remover has been trusted to handle major restoration projects on historic buildings and landmarks, government facilities, and opera and music halls worldwide. Unlike other paint removers, Smart Strip does not contain dangerous Methylene Chloride or hazardous NMP.
